Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can lying to a visa officer justify refusal under s. 19(2)(d) and s. 11(3)?
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's honesty questioned due to alleged bribe offer
Crimes.Legal_Provision: s. 19(2)(d), s. 11(3) of the Immigration Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misuse of discretion and procedural unfairness
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness and fairness in administrative decision-making
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of procedural fairness and improper use of s. 11(3)
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative immigration interview and subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Context of the $500 payment as a gift vs. bribe
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refusal based on lying and moral character
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Improper expansion of s. 11(3) to include moral suitability
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Quashed and remitted for new interview
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Alleged lying about offering a bribe
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of opportunity to respond to bribe allegation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Violation — applicant not informed of true purpose of interview
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant's truthfulness regarding intent of $500 payment
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to validity of refusal under s. 11(3)
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose grounds of refusal during interview

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Immigration application refusal following conduct involving money transfer
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was procedural fairness denied and was the refusal legally justified?
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Procedural fairness and proper exercise of discretion under s. 11(3)
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Applicant not informed of real reason for second interview
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Invalid refusal based on non-economic factors under s. 11(3)
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Violation — lack of transparency in interview purpose
Crimes.Legal_Framework: Canadian immigration law and administrative law principles
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Challenged fairness and legality of refusal
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Relied on personal suitability and potential criminality
Crimes.Governing_Rule: s. 11(3) discretion must relate to economic establishment

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refusal based on alleged attempt to bribe immigration officer

Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Offer of $500 to expedite visa process
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Visa denial based on attempted bribery
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On officer to justify discretionary refusal
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Nature of $500 payment — gift or bribe
Crimes.Legal_Rule: s. 11(3) allows refusal only if points do not reflect economic establishment
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide fair opportunity to respond
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Use of non-economic factor (bribery) under s. 11(3)
Crimes.Review_Standard: Reasonableness and correctness on jurisdictional issue
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Denied — applicant unaware of true grounds
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Argued misuse of discretion under s. 11(3)
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Invoked personal suitability and risk of criminal behavior
Crimes.Governing_Rule: s. 11(3) discretion limited to economic factors
